sentence.Network_en: The riveter riveted the metal sheets to the ship's bottom.
sentence.Network_cn: 铆工把薄金属板铆在船底上.

sentence.Network_en: The experiment proved that the recoil force of the electromagnetic riveter has reduced greatly.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过试验表明,优化后铆枪的后坐力明显减小.

sentence.Network_en: Experiments show that the vibration and noise level of new riveter are decreased obviously.
sentence.Network_cn: 实验表明新的铆枪结构后坐力和噪音明显降低.
